attributes.action: make illegal the levy of a standing charge on essential services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be no standing charges on essential sevices eg. gas, electricity , water and telephone.
These standing charges disadvantage the poorest in society where the standing charge/line rental can make up the most of a bill, by just paying where metered for what you use enables customers to economise.
British gas has removed the standing charges and not suffered financially so all suppliers of essential services should be required by legislation to do likewise.
